title: Truncated smooth function spaces. (arXiv:2211.01529v1 [math.FA])
description: We introduce truncated Besov and Triebel--Lizorkin function spaces and investigate their main properties: embeddings, interpolation, duality, lifting, traces. These new scales allow us to improve several known results in functional analysis and PDE's.
dc:creator: Oscar Domínguez, Sergey Tikhonov
